00022 int NodeManager::registerNode(const std::string& node_name, const std::string& node_type, int criticality, int heartbeat_rate, int heartbeat_tolerence)throw(NonUniqueNodeName){
00023         container _n(node_name, node_type, criticality, heartbeat_rate, heartbeat_tolerence);
00024         this->nodes_[this->next_id_]=_n;
00025         this->next_id_++;
00026         return this->next_id_-1;
00027 }

00029 const NodeManager::container& NodeManager::getNode(int node_id) const throw(NoMatchingNodeId){
00030         checkId(node_id);
00031         return this->nodes_.at(node_id);
00032 }
00033 
00034 void NodeManager::touch(int node_id)throw(NoMatchingNodeId){
00035         checkId(node_id);
00036         this->nodes_[node_id].touch();
00037 }
00038 
00039 void NodeManager::deleteNode(int node_id)throw(NoMatchingNodeId){
00040         checkId(node_id);
00041         this->nodes_.erase(node_id);
00042 }
00043 
00044 bool NodeManager::checkId(int node_id)const throw(NoMatchingNodeId){
00045         if(this->nodes_.count(node_id)==1){
00046                 return true;
00047         }else throw NoMatchingNodeId(node_id);
00048         return false;
00049 }

00051 void NodeManager::printList(std::stringstream& output) const{
00052         BOOST_FOREACH(node_map::value_type item, this->nodes_){
00053                 output<<"["<<item.first<<"]"<<item.second<<"\n";
00054         }
00055 }

00057 void NodeManager::timeCheck(result_map& results, ros::Time& checkTime) const{
00058         BOOST_FOREACH(node_map::value_type item, this->nodes_){
00059                 //If the heartbeat rate check in enabled by being greater than 0
00060                 if(item.second.getHeartbeatRate()>0){
00061                         //Calculate all the durations
00062                         ros::Duration tolerence(item.second.getHeartbeatTolerence());
00063                         ros::Duration check_rate(item.second.getHeartbeatRate());
00064                         ros::Duration heart_rate(checkTime-item.second.getLastTouch());
00065 
00066                         results[item.first].second = item.second.getCriticality();
00067                         //If the duration of the last heartbeat was longer than the expected duration plus tolerence, it failed
00068                         if(heart_rate>(check_rate+tolerence)){
00069                                 results[item.first].first = false;
00070                         }
00071                         //Otherwise it passed
00072                         else{
00073                                 results[item.first].first = true;
00074                         }
00075                 }
00076                 //Otherwise it automatically passes
00077                 else{
00078                         results[item.first].second = item.second.getCriticality();
00079                         results[item.first].first  = true;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082 }
00083 
00084 const NodeManager::container& NodeManager::operator[](int node_id) const throw(NoMatchingNodeId){
00085         return getNode(node_id);
00086 }

00088 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const NodeManager& rhs){
00089         BOOST_FOREACH(NodeManager::node_map::value_type item, rhs.nodes_){
00090                 out<<"["<<item.first<<"]"<<item.second<<"\n";
00091         }
00092         return out;
00093 }
